content:
# I successfully inserted 5 coal into the Stone Furnace, and my inventory now contains 3 stone and 10 iron ore. 
# The furnace should now be able to smelt iron ore into iron plates, but I need to ensure that it has the necessary ingredients.

# Step 17: Start the smelting process by checking the furnace status and ensuring it has iron ore to smelt.
start_smelting(stone_furnace)  # Initiate the smelting process in the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Furnace status after starting smelting: {get_entity_status(stone_furnace)}")  # Check the status of the furnace.
